Literature.Title: Computational Design of Pore-Forming Peptides with Potent Antimicrobial and Anticancer Activities
Literature.Author: Deb R, Torres MDT, Boudný M, Koběrská M, Cappiello F, Popper M, Dvořáková Bendová K, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=0.4µM),Staphylococcus carnosus CCM 4838T(MIC=0.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=>16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii GSAB 164(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCTC 13437(MIC=>16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>16µM)
